tgt_original: kukṣiṃ viśantaṃ gajavad hi māyā-  devyā vilokyaiva kulaṃ namāmi ||2 || (3)
janiṃ bhajantaṃ khalu lumbinīvane  śākyātmajaṃ vai daśamāsapūrtau |
nṛsiṃhamaṅge magadhe ca śilpaṃ  pradarśayantaṃ balinaṃ kumāram |
tyaktvā gṛhaṃ vyomapathena gatvā |  pravrājayantaṃ nijamātmanā taṃ
varṣāṇi ṣaḍ duṣkaracāriṇaṃ tam |  nairañjanānte khalu vīryapāraṃ
devān vināyyātha vinītakālaṃ  jñātvā'vatīryāpi ca devalokāt |
ṣaṭ tīrthyaśāstṝnatha nigrihītuṃ  yo devadattādyaparān kudṛṣṭīn |
pravitrakauśīnagarīyabhūmau |  tyaktvāmaraṃ vajrasamānakāyaṃ  namāmi yātaṃ parinirvṛtiṃ tam ||12 || (8)
samyaktayā santamapi hyamartyaṃ ,  puṇyaṃ labheranniti bhāvisattvāḥ |
